metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: o Mix ground beef, ground pork, diced onion, minced garlic, breadcrumbs, beaten
Shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, shredded cheese, sour cream, and salsa for toppings
o Drain on paper towels and serve.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: o Add potatoes and cauliflower, stir to coat with spices o Cover and cook until vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally o Mix ground beef, ground pork, diced onion, minced garlic, breadcrumbs, beaten o Heat olive oil in a pan and brown meatballs on all sides o Arrange meats, cheeses, olives, and vegetables on a platter.

Shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, shredded cheese, sour cream, and salsa for toppings In a skillet, cook ground beef over medium heat until browned Add diced onion and minced garlic, sauté until softened Stir in taco seasoning and water, simmer until thickened Serve beef mixture in taco shells or tortillas with desired toppings

o Sauté diced bacon, onion, and minced garlic in butter until crispy o Add cassava flour and cook, stirring constantly, until golden o Toast pita breads until crispy, then break into pieces o Whisk lemon juice, olive oil, sumac, and salt, then pour over salad.
o Add noodles, fish sauce, tamarind paste, sugar, and lime juice, stir to combine o Add bean sprouts, cooked shrimp, and chopped green onions
In a bowl, combine cottage cheese, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and bell pepper
